Art Stewart bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé injinia ọdịyo, na ónyé na-ede egwu nke rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ndekọ Motown
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Blue album nke Diana Ross, na ndekọ nke Teena Marie, gụnyere Wild and Peaceful album ya, nke e wepụtara na 1979
Ya na Marvin Gaye, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na album Let's Get It On na egwu Gaye "Got to Give It Up"
Ya na Rick James rụkwara ọrụ na abọm izizi ya na Motown Come Get It!, na abọmpi nke abụọ ya na Motowns, Bustin 'Out of L Seven

Stewart bụ ónyé injinia na-arụ ọrụ màkà Motown Records ma soro Marvin Gaye na Diana Ross rụọ ọrụ. Ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ihe na-apụta na Motown Grammy Rhythm & Blues Performances Of The 1960s & 1970s dị iche iche artists compilation album.  Ọ bụkwa ónyé na-ede egwu ma dee egwu maka otu Platypus, nke pụtara na album Cherry, nke e wepụtara na Casablanca Records na 1980. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ngwakọta nke album Has Arrived màkà The Whole Darn Family, otu nke gosipụtara Tyrone Thomas. N'afọ 1977, a họpụtara ya dị ka nke 45 na ndepụta nke 100 ndị na-emepụta pop site na magazin Billboard na mbipụta Disemba 1977.
